value:
Conferring Blessings:
Use a blessing item to confer
blessings on your allies.

Blessings cannot be conferred on
Legendary Heroes, Mythic Heroes,
or Chosen Heroes.

Blessing Effects #1:
Blessed allies receive double
the usual amount of SP and EXP
during battles.

Please note that while blessings
cannot be conferred on
Legendary Heroes, Mythic
Heroes, or Chosen Heroes, they
will always earn double the usual
amount of SP and EXP in battle.

Blessing Effects #2:
Match a Legendary Hero or
Mythic Hero, the current season's
type, and your allies' blessings to
earn a special bonus.

For example, go into battle with
the Water-type Legendary Hero
Fjorm during Water season with
Water-blessed allies to earn
a bonus of HP+3 and Spd+3.

Season Schedule:
You can check the top of the
Battle screen and other locations
for info on the current season.

Legendary, Mythic, & Chosen:
These Heroes have an icon on
their profile screen. Tap the icon
to check what type of effect
they have.

Mythic/Legendary/Chosen Effects:
・During their seasons, Legendary/
Chosen Heroes will receive
Mythic Effects in Aether Raids.
・During their seasons, Mythic/
Chosen Heroes will receive
Legendary Effects. (Mythic
Heroes will not receive these
effects in Aether Raids.)
